name: Baller (bradu)
description:
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • 1 / 2  to change state
  • Esc to quit
  • R to restart
Features
  • ⚾ Reach the vibrating tree
  • ⚽ Change state on the fly
  • 🏀 Each state with it's own properties
  • 🥎 How fast can you get to the exit ?
Team
  • laurents: Design
  • bradu: Code

Music by Patrick de Arteaga.

Made for Finish Your Gamejam 2022 in 2 days.
